'''''The Carp Leaps, Heaven's Gates Open''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete a specific [[Golden Carp's Leap]] puzzle located at the estuary at the southwest of [[Chenyu Vale: Southern Mountain]].

The puzzle can be started by first guiding the three [[Seelie]]s at the top of the mountains in the vicinity.

==Trivia==
*The achievement's title is a reference to the Chinese folk tale of {{zh|鲤跃龙门|Lǐ Yuè Lóngmén|{{w|Carp#Jumping_carp_the_Chinese_folk_tale|the carp jumping over dragon gate}}}}, which alleges that carp who succeed in jumping over a dragon gate ascend to become dragons.
